refnamediv.refpurpose: program to upload pictures and video to Gallery

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: This manual page documents briefly the &dhpackage; command.
&dhpackage; is a program that allows to easily upload pictures and video to Gallery installations; Gallery () is an advanced web photo album organizer.
If FILES are given, they are the files which must be uploaded. If no argument is given instead, a small browser window will open where the user can select items to upload.

refsect1.title: HOW TO ENABLE AS NAUTILUS SCRIPT
refsect1.para: Nautilus, GNOME's default file manager, supports scripts, which can be activated on any selected file(s) from the right-button menu; &dhpackage; plays perfectly the role of a Nautilus script.
